  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.bitcoinj.core.Wallet.addKey(ECKey)
    org.bitcoinj.core.Wallet.addKeys(List<ECKey>)
    org.bitcoinj.core.PeerGroup.awaitRunning()
    org.bitcoinj.core.PeerGroup.awaitTerminated()
    org.bitcoinj.core.Wallet.calculateAllSpendCandidates(boolean)
    Use Wallet.calculateAllSpendCandidates(boolean, boolean) or the zero-parameter form instead.
    org.bitcoinj.core.Sha256Hash.create(byte[])
    org.bitcoinj.core.Sha256Hash.createDouble(byte[])
    org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionInput.getFromAddress()
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.getFromAddress(NetworkParameters)
    org.bitcoinj.core.PeerGroup.getMemoryPool()
    org.bitcoinj.core.Wallet.getWatchedBalance()
    Use Wallet.getBalance() instead as including watched balances is now the default behaviour
    org.bitcoinj.core.Wallet.getWatchedBalance(CoinSelector)
    Use Wallet.getBalance(CoinSelector) instead as including watched balances is now the default behaviour
    org.bitcoinj.script.Script.isSentToP2SH()
    org.bitcoinj.core.Wallet.maybeDoMaintenance(KeyParameter, boolean)
    Renamed to doMaintenance
    org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters.prodNet()
    org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters.regTests()
    org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters.testNet()
    org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters.testNet2()
    org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters.testNet3()
    org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters.unitTests()
